Posts.Content: Bff4321 wrote: my BFF was diagnosed with triple negative 6 months ago and had chemo then mastectomy then radiation.  One month ago diagnosed with mets to lungs and lymph nodes. Going back to md Anderson end of January for more scans and then will start a clinical trial.  I guess my first concern is why r they waiting so long for treatment?? I am so scared for her.  How can I help????  Honestly.   What is the prognosis???  Log in to post a reply
Posts.Title: BFF with triple negative and mets to lung and lymph nodes Bff4321 ziggypop
